step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap, maintaining a relaxed posture.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer to your head as you bring your hands up.
Excellent! You're spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Great hold! You maintained the position effectively, promoting good shoulder and chest stretch.
Nicely done reversing the motion. You returned to the starting position smoothly.
Good clasping for the second rep. Ensure your shoulders remain relaxed as you begin to raise your hands.
You're bringing your hands up effectively. Focus on keeping those elbows in close to your head.
Excellent spread! Your elbows are wide behind your head, and your posture is good.
Well held! You maintained the stretch nicely, keeping your head upright.
Great job returning to the start. The reverse motion was smooth and controlled.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close to your head when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Maintain an upright posture throughout.
